com.ikalagaming.packages

Class PackageSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikalagaming.packages.PackageSettings

  • public class PackageSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Configurable settings that allow changing the behavior of the package system.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean ENABLE_ON_LOAD
      If packages should be enabled by the package manager when they are loaded.
      static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_ACCESS
      If the package manager should use events for altering packages.
      static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_DISABLE
      True if the package manager should use an event to call the packages disable method.
      static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_ENABLE
      True if the package manager should use an event to call the packages enable method.

    • Field Detail

      • ENABLE_ON_LOAD

        public static boolean ENABLE_ON_LOAD
        If packages should be enabled by the package manager when they are loaded. If this is false then packages must be enabled manually after they are loaded.

      • USE_EVENTS_FOR_ACCESS

        public static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_ACCESS
        If the package manager should use events for altering packages. False if they should be loaded, unloaded, disabled, etc using direct function calls. If false, this may cause slower loading/unloading but would ensure the packages receive the commands immediately/directly. Each type of alteration has its own individual setting if this is true.
        If no event system is available, defaults to direct access.

      • USE_EVENTS_FOR_ON_LOAD

        public static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_ON_LOAD
        True if the package manager should use an event to call the packages onLoad method. False if it should call directly. Has no effect if USE_EVENTS_FOR_ACCESS is false.

      • USE_EVENTS_FOR_ON_UNLOAD

        public static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_ON_UNLOAD
        True if the package manager should use an event to call the packages onUnload method. False if it should call directly. Has no effect if USE_EVENTS_FOR_ACCESS is false.

      • USE_EVENTS_FOR_ENABLE

        public static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_ENABLE
        True if the package manager should use an event to call the packages enable method. False if it should call directly. Has no effect if USE_EVENTS_FOR_ACCESS is false.

      • USE_EVENTS_FOR_DISABLE

        public static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_DISABLE
        True if the package manager should use an event to call the packages disable method. False if it should call directly. Has no effect if USE_EVENTS_FOR_ACCESS is false.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PackageSettings

        public PackageSettings()
